content.detailedDescription: At the time of these sightings, i lived in westminster, just north of huntington beach and east of the seal beach naval weapons station. at about 1:00 am on 12/27/13, from my backyard, i was observing a star-like light, in the southwestern sky, through my 50x binoculars.  i moved to my front yard for a better look. the light did not move, but flashed multiple colors, much like some stars do, but something kept me fixed on it, not convinced it was a star.   i video recorded with my camcorder for awhile, then went back to my binoculars.  suddenly i observed it move a short distance north, then stop, then with lightning shhpeed it flew west, leaving a blue flame-like trail, and disappeared.  within ", it reappeared, flew back to where it had moved to, then back to it's original position.  i decided to take a still picture of it with my camcorder to see if i could get more detail.  i focused and zoomed in on it.  as soon as i did, i saw an orange saucer appear to the left of the star-like light, immediately followed by a blue saucer, then a pink-red saucer.  different colored saucers lit up one by one to the left and about 3 to the right of the white light until there were about 12 total.  i just stood watching - completely dumbstruck by what was happening.  then the saucers on the right started to turn off their light one by one.  i had presence of mind to snap a picture before they all disappeared.  these saucers were not in any formation, but scattered at different heights, but all were level.  by the time i took the picture, they were tilted, as if they had moved. i ran to tell my husband and by the time i got back outside, they were no longer visible.  i was really un-nerved by this.  i am an avid sky watcher - every night, but i was so un-nerved by this event, it took me almost 3 weeks before i would look at the night sky.  when i finally got up the nerve to do so, i went to the same spot i saw the star-like light on the 27th.  there it was again, so i again decided to take a picture.  this time, 5 or 6 saucers lit up one by one, but this time they were in a straight line.  i tried snapping pics, but my hands shook too much to capture a good pic.  once again they turned off their lights one by one. the only good picture i have is the one from the 27th.  both times, i had the feeling that these saucers had been hovering for some time, before revealing themselves.  i also think that they may have been observing the naval weapons station.  i reported the sighting on the 27th to another ufo site soon after it happened, but finally i decided i should report both my sightings to mufon.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Starlike object not moving, suddenly speed away, disappear, reappear, speed back to original position, followed by 12 saucer shaped objects light up one by one.L

content.detailedDescription: At about 6:30 pm i stood in front of my building talking with a friend, when i looked up at the sky i noticed an object stationary in the sky, so i asked two more tenants in my building do they see the same object stationary in the sky? they said yes and one let me use her cellphone to take the picture, not satisfied i went inside and got my digital camera and took pictures, later to nypd officers passed by and i asked them what was the object in the sky. by this time it was getting dark, so i went inside and uploaded the pictures in my digital camera into my laptop
content.summary: About 6:30 pm as i stood in front of my building, i looked up in the sky and noticed this object stationary high above the clouds, i had three other people who witnessed this object that was stationary, as well as two n.Y.P.D officers,

content.detailedDescription:
i just pulled into the house from my son’s baseball practice and we were unloading our gear from the truck when i noticed a strange object in the sky. at first it appeared to be hovering and i looked away for a split second to check on my son as he asked me what it was. at that point i returned my attention back to the object and told him that i was not sure. the object then began moving west at a very slow pace not making a sound. 

my son and i were just standing there watching in disbelief.When i realized i should be taking photos. so i pulled out my cell phone and snapped three photos of it. the object appeared to be 2500-3000ft in height and a distance of ½ to ¾ of a mile away. there was cloud cover and it seemed well below it. my son and i watched it for about 3 min before it shot up at about a 75 to 80 degree angle and disappeared. it moved incredibly fast almost bullet like. what an incredible adrenalin filled moment that i got to share with my son.
content.summary: It was a grey circular shaped object that made absolutely no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
Sunday september 14, 2014, over the noon hour at 12:29 pm i saw a new craft in the skies... i had been looking into the same area where i saw a light the previous friday evening.  i noticed what i thought was a momentary bright flash in the sky.  because of this i took my camera and telephoto out to see if i could view anything of the sort through the lens... even momentarily.   i didn't see anything for the first few minutes.  then after putting down the camera, and just scanning with my eyes, i noticed what at first seemed to be a white bird in the distance.
i decided to take some photos so over the next 43 seconds i took five shots.  the white object did not behave like a bird, but then also seemed odd for an airplane.  then i started to blow up the images..... it was definitely not either one.  i have cropped and edited them for better detail.   the first image seemed to have been the most out of range and therefore out of focus... but as it got further away, the detail gets better.  the last photo is the clearest.

the first photo was taken at 315°, and the final photo a 337°.  they were at approximately 15 degrees from the horizon.   the direction of travel seems be ese or about 116° from the undeveloped land in the western areas of blue springs lake toward the area of the marina, or beyond.  analysis of the size of the first and final image shows that it grew in size nearly doubling (1.8 times).  the clarity improved as the images were taken and the final one at 337 ° is the clearest and larger.  this leads to the conclusion that the image first observed was further away, and the final photo closer.  the focus on the camera was not changed.  

during the 43 seconds, approximately .63 miles distance was covered.  the rate of travel seemed to be constant, and calculates to be 53 mph, much too slow for aircraft.  altitude in photo 1 was about 1400 ft, and the final photo was about 1,050 ft. descending.

the second photo shows an interesting item:  there appears to have been a dark triangular craft that appeared crossing the path of the white object.  it must have been traveling at a high rate of speed since the previous photo, and the third photo which were approximately 5 seconds earlier and later do not show evidence of the triangular craft.
content.summary: White object in full daylight

content.detailedDescription:
I'm a male, and in about 1975, i was camping with a girlfriend in a wilderness area called "desolation wilderness" near pollack pines,  california, off highway 50. that's in the mountains on the road to lake tahoe in northern california, east-northeast of san francisco. it's since been heavily logged, but was pristine wilderness at the time of this event.

we had back-packed in a few miles from the end of a logging road the previous afternoon. it was now (guessing) about 9:00 or 10:00 pm of the next night. we were sitting around our campfire in front of our tent and talking - enjoying a clear, cloudless, night and starry mountain sky. there was no moon out and no wind. we were in a mountainous area, with tall evergreen trees around our small clearing/meadow, so we could see maybe 1/3 of the sky. we could barely make out the nearest granite mountain peak (above the tree line) to our north-west.

our campfire was probably the only light within a 5 or 10 mile radius - except maybe for car lights on the two lane highway 50 past placerville which we had come in on.

i happened to look up and saw a strange, sparkling star-like object about at the zenith. but it was larger than a star, being a tiny visible sphere, maybe the size of a pea held at arms length. it was a golden color and had a peculiar sparkling quality - not twinkling, but like throwing off a lot of sparks. as i watched it, it began to circle over us (or maybe it was already circling) and then seemed to get larger and brighter. after it completed a couple of perfect circle descending spirals it became obvious that it was descending toward us. that is, the we were at the center of it's descending circular spirals.  as it continued this smooth, even, silent, well co-ordinated spiral descent, i became fearful.

my girlfriend had not noticed the object and for some reason, perhaps a protective reflex, i didn't want her to.

now the object was closer and i think i remember it casting a glow on the surrounding terrain. it how appeared like a 4th of july sparkler, with the whole golden surface made of something like outward moving sparks, but much shorter than on a sparkler and many more of them.

at this point, i put out our fire and pretty much dragged my girlfriend into our tent, saying it was time to go to sleep. although i had been very frightened, i was somehow almost instantly asleep and remember only that i saw a lot of flashing lights through the tent fabric as i went to sleep. i thought to myself that i had not put the fire out properly and the wind had come up suddenly and was blowing the fire back alight and the campfire was casting a lot of bright flickering lights and shadows onto the tent fabric. but this was strictly a rationalization - there was no evidence of that and i heard no wind nor any other sounds.

the next morning we woke up normally, packed up and left. for some reason i made no mention of the ufo and did not look around for any physical evidence. we just packed up and hiked back to my car. i never mentioned the event to her. a few months later, we ended our relationship and i lost track of her.

were we abducted? i don't know. a couple of years ago, during a routine exam, my doctor asked me about a scar and small lesion near the center of my chest. he asked how i had been wounded. i could only say that i had no idea and no memory of any such trauma. i had been aware of that scar for years. i looked for that scar recently and it has vanished - after years of staying unchanged and very visible.
content.summary: Spiral descent orange sphere

content.detailedDescription: I saw one flashing light in the south east. went to the back yard to follow it and noticed another flashing light in the south west. this is right after a airplane landed. both flashing lights traveled to the south met up flashed a few times and went back in there opposite directions. only a humming sound being made. definitely not other airplanes. they were moving to fast across the sky for that.
content.summary: 2 ufo's sighted

content.detailedDescription:
In the 1950's, i was young teenager. i'm now in my 70's and wish to report this while i'm still around.

it was a warm summer night and my mother allowed me and my twin brother to "sleep out" in the back yard. there were no clouds, no smog (location east of los angeles), stars were visible, no moon. was laying in sleeping bag with feet pointed about due north. my brother was a few feet away to my left in the same orientation.  

saw a circular light fly overhead, silently, in a straight line, directly overhead approximately aligned with my body. it crossed 90 degrees of sky and vanished over the northern horizon in 5 or 6 seconds, at a constant speed. there was a tree line to the north, perhaps 8 or 10 degrees into the sky. in other words, i assume the object came over the horizon to the south (behind my head), but i couldn't see it until it came into my field of view as i looked straight up from my prone position.

my brother also saw this. when i mentioned it to him this year and asked if he remembered it, he remembered two objects instead of one, with the same colors and behavior. i don't remember that we discussed it at all at the time of the siting - perhaps i thought he was asleep.

the appearance was of two colors, an inside circle with the color of the darker part of a natural gas burner flame blue (e.G. a kitchen range). the outside circle has a lighter color like the lighter blue of a natural gas burner flame. i also thought of the two colors as similar to the blue colors of the tips of some kitchen matches. the line between the inner and outer colors was blurred and (if memory serves) the outer circle was about 60% of the object and the inner circle about 40%. there was no distinct trail, but there was a tiny fuzzy "tail" on the outer edge opposite the direction of flight - maybe 5% to 15% of the size of the object. 

the overall impression was a glowing ball of gas, yet flat or 2 dimensional and only as viewed from the bottom, with the object perfectly level. in other words, no height dimension visible.
content.summary: Circular gas flame colors

content.detailedDescription: My husband called the family outside to observe what he was seeing. it was a glowing orange light that looked like a plane but was much closer with no red running lights. it silently flew from northwest to southwest before flying out of sight.
content.summary: Glowing orange light like a plane but quiet and slow

content.detailedDescription:
Hi,  and i have something to tell about an abduction that happened to me. i am 57 years old now , but this thing started when i was a little girl ,,i was outside playing when my sister told me years later she saw a very large ufo in the skies watching me while i was playing, i only remember going to the basement at night because something was calling. as i got older i started college that's when i saw them,,, i was doing my clinical for nursing school when i first saw one.
 
he looked like a doctor he had a white jacket on and as i was walking up to the nurse's station he turned around and his eye were all black no whites in his eyes ,,,then he blinked and his eyes were normal again,,,i thought, ,wow,, then i thought no you didn't see anything, the next thing that happened  ' i will try to explain this the best way i can ,,,the next thing i was in a room in the hospital and this 'man' was in front of me with his back to me and i was walking towards him ,,then my instructor grab me by the shoulder and said ' you are not suppose to be in here ,,,and this person ? tense up as i was looking at him but he never turned around then i wonder ...How did i get in here ?? then i followed my instructor out of the room . a few nights later i was in bed with my husband and then i woke up and looked out the window and i saw flashing lights ,,red green and other colors outside my bedroom window ,,,but i was thinking,,, we are up stairs why do i see these lights just outside my window ?? the next thing i know i looked down at the foot of the bed i saw this ...Thing,,, it had very large black eyes and it was tall and pure white with a shirt on the shirt was a plaid shirt and it was looking at me then that is all i remember but they did something to my belly ,, to this very day i cant stand for someone to touch my stomach ' my belly button'    

i had other encounters around this time as well i was 29 years old,,, i need to talk about it because i use to cry a lot when i thought about it but now i would like to know ,,,,whats going on ???!!!  i gave my life to god and i love him very much , but i know there are things going on in this world that need to be explained,,,so can you explain any of this ???
content.summary: I saw something

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking home to my apartment. i noticed 3 bright reflective objects in the sky of various sizes (or distances). i then noticed 5 more very small objects between them that were also bright and reflective. i was looking north at that time. all were spherical. they looked very much like stars but it was broad daylight. 

at first i thought it was a group of parachutists but they were not falling. they maintained altitude and appeared to be drifting in the wind like balloons to the southeast. my second thought was that they were balloons but they were were much too high for hot air balloons and were all a consistent color which would be unusual for a hot air balloon festival. 

i took several pictures but only the 3 largest objects appeared in the picture. while watching them the objects appeared to maintain the same formation, however, after looking at the pictures i can see that the formation did change slightly. 

while watching i also saw a small red object cross in the middle of all the objects on a west to east path. it was about the same size as the smallest reflective objects. it also appeared to be spherical but it was very small so it's hard to say. 

i watched them for about 10 minutes until my view was lost as they went behind a building. i didn't follow them further because i thought they were probably balloons. however, i can't imagine why so many balloons would be all together like that.
content.summary: Reflective orbs floating over queens

content.detailedDescription:
Was out in the yard with the dogs when i heard a small plane low overhead so looked up, saw a single engine plane traveling east-west at approx. 500 feet. directly overhead and much higher than the plane (but not as high as the regular jet route above) saw a white orb-like object going north-south very quickly. as it moved it looked alternately white and transparent, with an occasional metallic glint. thought at first it must be a party balloon but realized it was going way too fast and there was zero wind at the time. our prevailing winds here are generally westerly, rarely northerly as they would have to have been to blow a balloon in that direction. didn't look balloon-like in that sense that it didn't appear to be buffeted by the wind at all - seemed solid and stayed on course. disappeared behind my house in less than a minute (approx. 50 deg. of sky) and i could no longer see it after running through my house and into the front yard - at that point it would have been heading directly into the glare of the mid-day sun. it left all my hair standing on end.

i can't guess at it's size - was about the size of my pinky fingernail at arm's length.
can't guess at its speed except to note that it went across the sky a lot faster than the iss does when it makes a visible pass overhead. 
height - i would guess at least twice as high as the small plane that appeared before it, which was probably as low as is legal here (500 feet?)
weather - 80 deg. f, clear skies, no wind, no clouds.

if it was a balloon, i feel silly reporting it - however, i want to report it for the record anyway. it had a definite "weirdness factor" to it in that it was going so fast, didn't act like a balloon and made my hair stand on end.
content.summary: White/transparent/metallic orb high in the sky, traveling quickly north-south. day time, clear skies.

content.detailedDescription:
My father was walking the dogs in the nearby hills, and called home just after sunset to tell my mother and i to look at a glowing unidentified flying object hovering in the sky. it was twilight, and the sky was a deep dusky blue and no stars had appeared yet. during the sunset, there had been a pink and purple glow on the clouds, which had now faded away.  there was no longer any light or color glowing on the sparse clouds, which remained only on the horizon in the distance. at first glance the object appeared round, emitting a uniform bright, white light. it looked too much too large to be a planet, or a star and too small to be the moon, so i grabbed the binoculars for a closer look. that is when i noticed an unusual inverted teardrop shape and that the glow was slightly mottled, though evenly distributed, like the moon. there was not a basket below it as you would see with a balloon. the lower apex of the teardrop was rounded. we took turns with the binoculars and after a few minutes the object's bright white light color slowly began to change to orange. i snapped some pictures of the ufo in it's orange stage. after a few minutes the object began to glow a deeper orange with less intensity, and then slowly changed to a faded bluish-white glow and seemed to continue to fade in size and intensity of glow, but appeared to remain in the same position in the sky the entire time.
    i went back inside while it was still fading and at that point i was more than surprised that my sister called from santa fe, which is 30 miles away, to say she had been watching it too! 
    today, i am beyond shocked to hear that people in albuquerque saw the exact same object at the same time...Albuquerque is ninety miles from here! this object must have been a far bigger than any of us imagined! 

please note: in the picture i took, the shape of this ufo was teardrop shaped but slightly irregular. a balloon would have had a very regular and symmetrical teardrop shape.
content.summary: For 20 minutes i watched a stationary, glowing inverted teardrop ufo that changed color three times, then faded in size and brightness.

content.detailedDescription:
Over a period of 4 yrs i have witnessed objects,with flashing lights, move across the sky (over my house) with eratic flight paths that would on occasion disappear.  the flight path is always
east to west.  the lights have passed close enough to hear any noise but there is none.  it is not unusual for multiple sightings to occur n the same evening.  i never witnessed any particular matter discharged while moving across my home.

in august 2014, while mowing the backyard i came across an area of grass where something had left an imprint of a perfect circle.  the grass was uniformly pressed down in a counter clockwise direction.  the circle was larger than a car tire and had an opening in the center.

the grass itself suffered no damage or discoloration however the tree branches next to the site are discolored and appear to be dying.  other vegatation growing on the ground has what appears to be a residue charcoal grey on some of the leaves. the growth of grass in this area is stunted when compared to the rest of the yard.

for sometime i have seen what appeared to be large square imprints as well as circles along the tree line in my front yard.  the grass is consideraby shorter than the backyard but  i could trace the outline with little effort.  the tree limbs above each design along with some of the surrounding foliage is dying as well.
content.summary: Strange,eratic lights have been observed  over a period of 4yrs.  the imprint of a circle,larger than a car tire, was discovered  while mowing  in the backyard.

content.detailedDescription: Going out to my car in the parking lot of my complex. noticed bright white light in the western sky. had no idea what it was - too small to be the moon, thought it could be a planet although it was too large. was stationary for about an hour. my dad (who couldn't see it in the sky - he is 300 mi away) said it was probably a weather balloon. kept checking outside - was still there before 8 pm and gone by 8:20.
content.summary: Stationary bright white orb in western sky

content.detailedDescription: Driving the 210 freeway in san bernardino headed west, approximately 3 miles from the 15 freeway interchange. dead ahead at 45 degrees vertical was this bright white light, emitting a gas cloud that was reflecting the objects light. it reminded me of a rocket engines firing in low earth orbit where there would be some atmosphere to interact with. the light and its cone of gas seemed to rotate up and become occluded by an unseen edge over a 2 minute period. there was no noise.
content.summary: Bright white light with cone of fog

content.detailedDescription: At approx 5:30am my mother in law was in the front yard waiting for the family dog to do his business when she looked up and saw 2 objects in the sky with blinking lights, she ran back inside and managed to get 2 pics, 1 pic shows 2 round objects and the other taken a few seconds later once the objects had disappeared just to show it wasn't the moon the she saw. per my mother in law the objects were not moving and were flashing bright colors.
content.summary: Round with blinking lights

content.detailedDescription:
Every night for the last 8 months i have been observing super bright lights above hwy 377/benbrook from a ridge east of it. there is always a bright white light object in the distance that when observed through binoculars appears to be bi-level in figure with lights that pulsate in multi-color.

last night there was also two disc shape figures, hovering back and forth around the white light object, that had dull red lights that would circumference the crafts. there was no real direction to their flights patterns. just hovering above neighborhoods below me with changes in direction and height and occasionally steering into the distance and circling back. 

they are as everyone explains them... dull in color, hard to distinguish consistently at night but recognizable disc shape for sure. they hover effortlessly and are silent.  

at one point this year there was a oil derrick between me and them and i had originally thought that the lights were associated with it. i drove out to the site and did not find anything suspicious. but now that it is gone there is a straight-line view between me and them. you can occasionally see cars and trucks on the hwy driving underneath them. they are not caused by light reflections or refractions. they hover and move unaffected by nearby traffic.
content.summary: Three discs. two had dull red lights. one would flicker/pulsate bright white and multicolor lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my room one of my family member called me. she said see what is that light . it didnt look like a airplane for 2 minutes we watched then we rushed for a camera till then it disappeared.
content.summary: Small light which looked abnormal

content.detailedDescription:
I was caring some fire wood from street to house court. 
while we push the wood carry i notice a black point moving at a relativ high altitude i stoped and try to figure out what was.
first time i thought that was a bird becouse it was black.
the ufo flight in straight line above the village i've notice it in the e and it flight to ne.
i was happy to see it i want it from long time, and becouse the most records are from us, unfortunately i do not have the camera to record "bad luck".
 it departed so i lost the visual contact.
content.summary: A black litlle sphere moving in straight line above the village.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in back yard after just starting a pit fire and turned the indians baseball game on in the second inning. sat down tilted back and looked straight up and saw this formation (it wasn't a solid object) like a flock of birds, but i've never seen birds up that high above the clouds. 
i cant stress enough how high these things appeared be, like when you see a passenger jet up there but its almost a spec, it was way way way up there.

they glowed orange-ish gold from the setting sun. it was boomerang/wide curved formation in front, but was filled-in in the middle and behind with these things too so it filled out like a semi circle in back.  it didn't appear to have any real actions other than moving from north to south at a steady pace, never really breaking formation. i lost the formation when it disappeared above cloud cover.
content.summary: Birds maybe? but man they were waaaaay up there.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my yard around 6 pm and noticed the object again. 3 to 4 days in a row prior around the same time, a friend and my self noticed this object.  about a week prior to this, my friend noticed 3 stationary objects just like this one, i also saw these objects then.  all were silver and reflective looking.  within a 10 mile radius of the object is a nuculear power plant and an airforce base.  
what mainly drew my attention to this was that it was daylight and the multiple objects and the singular one seemed stationary and was not a plane or jet.  each time the object(s)were seen they seemed to stay stationary for 5-10 minutes and then disappeared.  the dates on the pictures listed as 3/28/2008 are incorrect on my friends camera.
content.summary: I was in my yard around 6 pm and noticed the object again. 3 to 4 days in a row prior around the same time, a friend and my self noticed this object.  within a 10 mile circle of object is a nuculear power plant and an airforce base.

content.detailedDescription: Around 6:30 in the evening i went into my backyard to move a lawn sprinkler.  observing the still daylight evening sky and horizon as usual, i saw a bright orb like light.  it was bright white and large, too large and in the wrong position to be a planet i thought.  i wondered if it might be a balloon of some sort.  i watched it with some curiosity for awhile noticing that it didn't move at all.  i went inside and brought my mom out into the yard to have a look at it.  she agreed that it was an unusual sight and oddly bright.  we joked about it being aliens.  as the daylight faded a bit i noticed that the still motionless orb turned a sort of orange color.  i asked my mom if she saw the color change.  she said she did.  we stopped the observation to go get something to eat.  as we drove down the street, still being curious, i kept glancing up to see if the orb was still visible.  it was, but seemed dimmed and it also began to look bluish.  the sky was rapidly progressing to darkness and as i drove i had to fight the urge to look up to see if it was still there, while driving through traffic.  when we reached our destination, i looked up to the place where the orb had been and still saw a dim light that was very much like a star in the darkened evening sky.  at this point i let the observation go as many stars were in the sky and nothing more of the unusual light i'd seen was visible.  i'd really like to know what it was.
content.summary: Large orb that could be taken for a weather balloon.  bright white in daylight sky before sunset.  color changed to orange as sun set.  stationary.

content.detailedDescription: My daughter was outside walking her dog, when she called me on the phone to hurry up and get out front, their are some crazy neon blue lights up in the sky and its crazy, i rushed outside and she pointed to the north just above the large treeline, and fricken wow, it looked like an oval bright blue like an led blue, and it was big , then poof its gone, then its back but way over to almost west heading, then it gets smaller, then larger, the speed makes it unlikely to be plane or helicopter, and a plane did go right past it, it didn't seem to notice, we watched it for about 45 minutes, got the whole family out to see it, a police car went thru the neighborhood, but i don't know if he saw it or not, the last time it blinked out it never reappeared, so that's all. now i'm sitting here wondering what the hell did we just see???
content.summary: Neon blue lights going real fast, then stop, disapear, appear, then hovers , very random

content.detailedDescription:
Friday night september 12, 2014 at 11:52 p.M a bright object appeared  in the northwestern sky.  it appeared at first to be a meteor, except that it travelled more slowly and lingered longer in its descent than normal meteors do in just a fraction of a second.  the bright light appeared next to “hive off” until 4 objects were now continuing the downward path and then disappeared below the tree line.  the total time that elapsed was about 3 seconds.

the light was in the nw part of the sky and travelled downward to the right.  it looked to be approximately 1 mile or so distant.  i judge the size of the objects to be somewhere between 10 and 25 feet, although that is very difficult to know for certain.

each of the objects was as bright as the original and the downward flight path did not deviate from the slope it originally had begun, roughly 45°.   what is especially interesting, is that these lights descended to the same exact place that the bright sphere emerged from on august 31.  (see reported case # 59513).

as previously reported, this area to which these lights descended is uninhabited, and forms the western shore of blue springs lake, and the lake itself.   it is not known if the lights descended into the lake, or if the bright sphere from 13 days earlier had emerged from the lake.
content.summary: Meteor-like light that hived off into four objects

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving west on route 70 between the flying j and pataskala exit, it was very dark as there are no streetlights here. i noticed a falling object that started directly above and in front of me - very high up and it fell at a constant rate and did not leave a trail or fade but rather slowed, changed direction toward the west and then disappeared all in one impossibly smooth motion.

i have seen hundreds of meteorites and even a flaming asteroid but never something that moved like this, it was exactly like the x-files so i'm calling it a ufo.
content.summary: Green light that changed direction, not a meteorite.

content.detailedDescription: We were at evergreen drive in, mt pleasant pa, screen 3.  i looked out the windshield and noticed what i thought at first was a helicopter.  it was cold but we had both side windows down.  i didn't hear a helicopter or anything else besides the movie.  it seemed right above an odd shaped treetop, like a kidney bean shape top.  as i was watching it it turned sharply, no other lights only the bright white light.  then it seemed to blink out and disappear.  i also didn't notice a beam of light such as what a helicopter search light would cast.  it was like the moon, just glowing, but very bright.  i believe it was between countryside plaza and the trees outside the perimeter of evergreen.  i didn't notice any light on anything below it, and it was so quick i can't be sure of the exact location, only where it was in relation to the treetop.   there is a dip on the treetop, a bend, it was in the crook of the upswing of that bend when i noticed it and  towards the crook of the much smaller bend when it vanished.  after it disappeared i was very shocked and excited and slapped my husband and said, "did you just see that?  please say you saw that!"  he said he hadn't.  then asked me what i saw, which i explained it to him.  i would've just wrote it off as a plane or copter, but it turned so sharply and stayed in the same path, then disappeared, so i truly don't believe it was a plane or copter.  when it turned, the light stayed steady, didn't dip or point down or up.  i'm still shocked and i've been trying to think of what i saw.  i've seen lots of shooting stars there, but those go totally straight and sort of fizzle, this was solid, turned steady and sharply and poof, it was gone.  i scanned the skies but didn't see anything else.
content.summary: Was at drive in, screen 3, saw bright, round white light, turned sharply, disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
My mother and i were watching tv with our balcony door open about a foot wide. i noticed the lights first flying up from behind the roof of the apartment building across the street from our balcony to the south. i caught movement out of the corner of my eye, they were very bright and demanded attention. i didn't really know what they could be because they were much larger and brighter than aircraft lights. there were about 6-7 lights in an upside down 'check' formation. they were flying at a steady pace from the south, heading north. they were bright orange, with no strobing white, red, or green lights like on most aircraft. there was no discernible sound either, and we can normally hear planes and helicopters flying overhead all the time, even if we can't see them. so to see something this bright and close with no sound was strange. directly behind the check formation came two more lights, not following each other, buy not exactly side by side either. and then finally one last pair closer together. they all traveled the same speed, the same direction, and with no sound. they looked very bright in the night sky, brighter than headlights even. they disappeared behind a large tree next to our balcony and i was unable to get outside to catch them out our front door. the videos are admittedly poor, shot through our screen door, with an ipad. the second is slightly better though. i wasn't fast enough to catch the initial formation though, just the two pairs that followed.
we really couldn't believe what we had seen, i've always believed in the potential for alien life but have remained pragmatic about it, if i've seen something silver in the sky i just assume it's a plane i can't quite make out clearly. but these lights i just can't explain. didn't look like search lights from helicopters, didn't look like aircraft lights, or meteors. i honestly can't explain it.
content.summary: Saw one formation of and two pairs of orange balls of lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting watching tv when my roommate came downstairs saying that you got to see this.

they happened to notice them from the upstairs window and i went outside also to observe what was being talked about, strange objects.

they were like nothing i have seen before.

when i got outside i looked up in the sky and observed 3 orbs travelling in a southerly direction gliding through the air with no apparent noise being produced. 

we were astonished at what we had observed not knowing what we had seen.

the orbs disappeared after slowing down then faded from sight. if they had normally travelled further south we would have still been able to see them.

i was able to take two quick pics with my cell phone, i am sending the clearest image.
content.summary: Unknown orbs transversing the night sky

content.detailedDescription: We were at bjs and saw it in the parking lot, we told a passer by and she saw it too. we were walking to our cars. the object was bright white in the sky in the daytime. my husband saw it first it was a clear sky  except for this in the sky. i thought it was a weather balloon a shiny one at first. the object hovered a bit and was a bright white  light in the sky. it was not a helicopter, airplane, or star nor moon. i was scared we were freaked out in the car looking at it. trying to explain what it was we were skeptical but it got red as the night sky came on. i was scared we were all scared. we dropped our friend off at indian school and told her to tell her mom. we lost sight when we got to belen. when we got here our neighbor was looking at the sky and we said hey we just saw a ufo and he said are you sure it wasnt  a star in the area, and we said no we saw it since albuquerque. omh!!!@
content.summary: Bright wihite light then turned white, looked giant

content.detailedDescription: Going home from town, the contrail (?) changing direction caught my eye. it began from the east moving west then did a deliberate turn back to the east. i told my husband, who also saw it, that it looked as though the pilot of a plane forgot something and turned around. he said it looked odd because he didn't think a plane could turn so abruptly. we lost sight when trees got in the way. i attached photo.
content.summary: Contrail to the north heading directly  west suddenly changed direction and headed directly east
